title: Low fps gtx 1080ti
body:
so im getting crappy fps. just played a game for the first time in months and it looks like its going to be this way
1440p 165hz monitor 
gtx 1080ti
ryzen 1700x
16gig ram 2400

anyone else getting bent over by this game? 
someone with a toaster is running this game better than i am .

replies.body: So first off, kinda hard to know what's 'low' without your FPS XP! It could most likely just be some slight [**frame-skipping**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) in which case I'd check out the guide Kokua mentioned as well. Alternately, if you just came back after months be sure to check for any missed driver updates too of course!

im getting 40-55 fps when in game. 
my gpu usage sits below 10% either in window boardless mode or full screen. 
can't seem to do anything about it???
You could reference the article for [Frame Skipping on High End PCs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs).

If you want decent performance then you have to use 3rd party programs. I (as a person with AMD card) personally use ClockBlocker. This program forces the gpu to stay on max clocks. With forced max clocks I have ~400fps (even though the GPU utilization is still low...) .
On NV cards you can do the same from MSI AB or EVGA Precision X.

I hope I could help ^^'

Same exact problem, it's the only reason I've been really keeping away from this game...

I have a similar problem. I also have a 1080ti and I was normally able to maintain well over 150 frames on max settings. Now my frames sometimes drop to a constant 30 and then back up. And it's not like this happens during teamfights only. It's literally just random. I don't know what the problem could be.
Like, all the time or what?
